attributes.action: Help All NHS staff get a bigger payrise
attributes.additional_details: Because it isn't further the MPs in parliament get bigger pay rise in the NHS all you guys do is think of yourselves rather an your nation and NHS!
attributes.background: I love love for you guys to help all NHS staff get what they deserve by giving them a big pay rise, they are killing themselves by trying to keep our nation alive! They are exhausted, anxious to come in to work the pay is ridiculously low and it's not fair eir.ie MPs get a higher pay rise than NHS!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
